Acknowledgements¶

Great thanks to:

  • Phillipe Carphin for inspiring the use of pandas.

  • Dominik Jacques for the awsome domUtils project, a great structure of what should be a python project.

  • Micheal Neish for the awsome fstd2nc project, great insights on how to develop xarray structure from CMC standard files and great functions to work on fst files.
